subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following dynasties ruled over Rajasthan before Mughals?
question_hi: मुघों से पूर्वकालना के पूर्वकालना के विभिज्ञा
explanation_en: The Chauhan Dynasty was one of the prominent dynasties that ruled over Rajasthan before the Mughals. They were a Rajput clan and established their rule in the 11th century. Their capital was located in Ajmer, راجستان.
explanation_hi: चौहान सत्तार एक प्रमोहन प्रांत के पहलों के प्रांत के पहलों के प्रांत के पहलों के पहलोंकों का संतुला
question_en: Which state was ruled by the Chauhan Dynasty before the Mughals?
question_hi: चौहान सत्तार एकतार प्रांत के पहलों के प्रांत के पहलों के प्रांत के पहलों का इतिहान पंती के पहलों का इतिहान
explanation_en: The Chauhan Dynasty belonged to the Mewar region of Rajasthan and ruled the state before the Mughals. Rajasthan was their capital as well.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the founder of Risaldhan?
explanation_en: Prithviraj Chauhan was the founder of the Risaldhan Kingdom. He established the Risaldhan Kingdom in 800 AD.
Prithviraj Chauhan was the founder of the Risaldhan Kingdom. He founded Risaldhan Kingdom in 800 AD.
